message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1000000. It's a fantastic opportunity for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $950000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $975000. It's a fair price for both of us and allows you to get a great deal on a valuable product. Let's make this happen!
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $960000 for the product.
